name: Math Draw
tagline: ASCII drawing tool using a math formula.
body:
#Math Draw This is an ASCII drawing tool using a math formula.
The formula can take 2 variables (i and j) and use the basic math operations.

You can also change the ASCII char modifier and the size of the ASCII image.

This project is using NCalc http://ncalc.codeplex.com/
![ScreenShot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Evenflow/mathdraw/master/Screenshots/screenshot11.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
